summary: Website for Masjid-e-Gausia Welfare Committee â€” a community welfare organization website.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Grand mosque exterior at dusk with warm golden lighting and minaret silhouettes against a deep teal-green sky, wide landscape banner (mosque-hero-banner.dim_1440x600.png)
- Circular emblem with Islamic geometric star pattern in gold and deep green on a cream background, suitable as an organization logo (committee-logo.dim_256x256.png)
- Horizontal decorative divider with repeating Islamic arabesque and geometric floral pattern in gold on transparent background (geometric-divider.dim_1200x80.png)

existing_features.title: Create a visually cohesive and elegant website theme inspired by Islamic geometric patterns and traditional motifs. Use a color palette of deep green, gold, and cream/off-white. Apply consistent Arabic-influenced decorative borders, geometric ornaments, and serif/elegant typography throughout the site for a dignified community organization feel.

Build a Hero/Header section with the organization name 'Masjid-e-Gausia Welfare Committee', a tagline such as 'Serving the Community with Faith and Compassion', and a prominent navigation bar with links to all main sections.
Build an 'About Us' section describing the Masjid-e-Gausia Welfare Committee, its mission, values, and community purpose. Include placeholder text that can be edited later.

Build a 'Services & Programs' section listing welfare activities such as Education Support, Food & Ration Distribution, Medical Assistance, and Community Events. Each service should have an icon, title, and brief description.

Build an 'Announcements / News' section that displays community announcements. On the backend, implement a Motoko actor with stable storage for announcements (title, body, date). Provide a public query to retrieve all announcements and an admin update function to add new ones. Display the announcements fetched from the backend on the frontend.

Build a 'Donate / Support Us' section with a compelling call-to-action encouraging community members to support the welfare committee. Include a visible donation appeal message and a placeholder for donation/contact details.

Build a 'Contact Us' footer section with placeholder fields for address, phone number, email, and a simple contact inquiry form (name, email, message, submit button). Store submitted contact inquiries in the backend using Motoko stable storage.

Render the generated static images (mosque-hero-banner, logo, and geometric divider) from frontend/public/assets/generated as visual assets in the hero section, header/logo area, and as decorative section dividers respectively.
